languages.text: {n}Офицеры с Порта Странник, где у вас еще {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}со времен службы во флоте{/d} остались знакомцы, немало рассказывали о капризах Зева — единственного маршрута из Империума в Простор Коронус. Тем не менее, слова Владайма звучат особенно тревожно — похоже, {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}что-то{/g} сильно повлияло на Зев.{/n}

{n}Officers from Port Wander, where you still have contacts from your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}days in the Navy{/d}, often talked about the whims of the Maw, the only route from the Imperium to the Koronus Expanse. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Офицеры с Порта Странник, где у вас еще {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}со времен службы во флоте{/d} остались знакомцы, немало рассказывали о капризах Зева — единственного маршрута из Империума в Простор Коронус. Тем не менее, слова Владайма звучат особенно тревожно — похоже, {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}что-то{/g} сильно повлияло на Зев.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Officers from Port Wander, where you still have contacts from your days in the Navy, often talked about the whims of the Maw, the only route from the Imperium to the Koronus Expanse. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

{n}Officers from Port Wander, where you still have contacts from your days in the Navy, often talked about the whims of the Maw, the only route from the Imperium to the Koronus Expanse. Warp storms would at times seal this sole available path for years, and so it's impossible to predict how long this new crisis might last.{/n}

{n}Officers from Port Wander, where you still have contacts from your days in the Navy, often talked about the whims of the Maw, the only route from the Imperium to the Koronus Expanse. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

{n}Officers from Port Wander, where you still have contacts from your days in the Navy, often talked about the whims of the Maw, the only route from the Imperium to the Koronus Expanse. Warp storms would at times seal this sole available path for years, and so it is impossible to predict how long this new crisis might last.{/n}

{n}Officers from Port Wander, where you still have contacts from your days in the Navy, often talked about the whims of the Maw, the only route from the Imperium to the Koronus Expanse. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

{n}Officers from Port Wander, where you still have contacts from your days in the Navy, often talked about the whims of the Maw, the only route from the Imperium to the Koronus Expanse. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたが{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}海軍にいたころ{/d}から繋がりのあるポート・ワンダーの士官たちは、帝国からコロヌス・エクスパンスへの唯一の航路であるマウの気まぐれな性質についてよく話をしていた。その中でも、ヴラダイムの言葉は特に考慮すべきものだ。{g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}何か{/g}がマウに大きな影響を及ぼしているようだ、と。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Officers from Port Wander, where you still have contacts from your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}days in the Navy{/d}, often talked about the whims of the Maw, the only route from the Imperium to the Koronus Expanse. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}海軍にいたころ{/d}から繋がりのあるポート・ワンダーの士官たちは、帝国からコロヌス・エクスパンスへの唯一の航路であるマウの気まぐれな性質についてよく話をしていた。その中でも、ヴラダイムの言葉は特に考慮すべきものだ。{g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}何か{/g}がマウに大きな影響を及ぼしているようだ、と。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你还在{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}帝国海军工作的那段日子{/d}里，漫游港的军官们经常会和你兴致勃勃地讨论暗流汹涌的巨口，那里是从帝国前往科罗努斯扩区的唯一路线。但即便如此，弗拉迪姆的话还是让你忧心忡忡，似乎{g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}某些东西{/g}对巨口产生了巨大影响。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Officers from Port Wander, where you still have contacts from your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}days in the Navy{/d}, often talked about the whims of the Maw, the only route from the Imperium to the Koronus Expanse. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你还在帝国海军工作的那段日子里，漫游港的军官们经常会和你兴致勃勃地讨论巨口的事情，那里是从帝国前往科罗努斯扩区的唯一路线。有的时候，亚空间的风暴会封锁这唯一的航线，持续数年之久。因此，没人能预测这场新的危机会持续多久。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los oficiales de Puerto Vagabundo, donde aún conservas contactos de tus {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}días de la Armada{/d}, a menudo hablaban de los caprichos de las Fauces, la única ruta que lleva del Imperium a la Extensión de Koronus. Sin embargo, las palabras de Vladaym son especialmente alarmantes. Parece que {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}algo{/g} ha afectado gravemente a las Fauces.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Officers from Port Wander, where you still have contacts from your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}days in the Navy{/d}, often talked about the whims of the Maw, the only route from the Imperium to the Koronus Expanse. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los oficiales de Puerto Vagabundo, donde aún tienes contactos de tus días en la Armada, hablaban a menudo de los azares de las Fauces, la única ruta desde el Imperium a la Extensión de Koronus. De vez en cuando, las tormentas de la disformidad dejaban inaccesible esta única vía durante años, por lo que es imposible predecir cuánto puede durar esta nueva crisis.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les officiers de Port l'Errance, où vous avez gardé des contacts depuis votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}service dans la Marine{/d}, évoquaient souvent les caprices de la Gueule, unique chemin reliant l'Imperium aux Étendues de Koronus. Pour autant, les allégations de Vladaym n'en sont pas moins alarmantes : il semble que {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}quelque chose{/g} ait profondément altéré la Gueule.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Officers from Port Wander, where you still have contacts from your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}days in the Navy{/d}, often talked about the whims of the Maw, the only route from the Imperium to the Koronus Expanse. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les officiers de Port l'Errance, où vous avez gardé des contacts depuis votre service dans la Marine, évoquaient souvent les caprices de la Gueule, unique chemin reliant l'Imperium aux Étendues de Koronus. Il arrive que des tempêtes Warp bloquent cette route pendant des années, personne ne peut donc prédire combien de temps cette nouvelle crise va durer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Offiziere aus Port Wander, zu denen du seit deiner {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Zeit bei der Flotte{/d} noch Kontakt hast, haben oft von den Launen des Schlunds berichtet, der einzigen Route vom Imperium in die Koronus-Ausdehnung. Trotzdem sind Vladayms Worte ausgesprochen alarmierend ... wie es scheint, hat {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}etwas{/g} nachhaltigen Einfluss auf den Schlund.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Officers from Port Wander, where you still have contacts from your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}days in the Navy{/d}, often talked about the whims of the Maw, the only route from the Imperium to the Koronus Expanse. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Offiziere aus Port Wander, zu denen du seit deiner Zeit bei der Flotte noch Kontakt hast, haben oft von den Launen des Schlunds berichtet, der einzigen Route vom Imperium in die Koronus-Ausdehnung. Manchmal versperren Warpstürme diesen einzig verfügbaren Weg für Jahre, und es lässt sich daher unmöglich vorhersagen, wie lange diese neue Krise dauern wird.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Donanma günlerinden{/d} hâlâ temasta olduğun Irak Liman'daki subaylar, İmparatorluk'tan Koronus Enginliği'ne uzanan tek rota olan Ağız'ın dengesizliğinden sık sık bahsederlerdi. Öyle bile olsa Vladaym'ın sözleri ayrıca endişe verici. {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}Bir şey{/g}, Ağız'ı derinden etkilemiş gibi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Officers from Port Wander, where you still have contacts from your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}days in the Navy{/d}, often talked about the whims of the Maw, the only route from the Imperium to the Koronus Expanse. Even so, Vladaym's words are particularly alarming — it seems that {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}something{/g} has had a profound effect on the Maw.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Donanma günlerinden hâlâ temasta olduğun Irak Liman'daki subaylar, İmparatorluk'tan Koronus Enginliği'ne giden tek yol olan Ağız'ın kaprislerinden sık sık bahsederlerdi. Öyle bile olsa Vladaym'ın sözleri ayrıca endişe verici. {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}Bir şey{/g}, Ağız'ı derinden etkilemiş gibi.{/n}
